Package coolGame.model.item

Interface Item

All Known Implementing Classes:
BloodlustGauntlets, ItemDec, LightningStaff, MageBerserkerGloves, PoisonWand, RejuvenatingChestplate, ShortSwordOfPower, StonewallShield, SwiftShoes, VampireGreatsword
public interface Item
The item interface is the interface in which every single item implements. This is used to give all the items the same method names so it is easier to go through all the special effects and item stats of the inventory arraylist.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String getDescription()
    Method that all the items use to print out their description.
    java.lang.String getName()
    Method that all the items use to print out their name.
    void itemStats()
    Method that all the items use to print out their item stats.
    void specialEffect​(Player player)
    This method runs at the start of every single turn to check if the conditions for the unique special effects are met.
    void updatePlayerStats​(Player player)
    This method runs every single time you pick up a new item.

  • Method Details

    • itemStats

      void itemStats()
      Method that all the items use to print out their item stats. This method is used everytime a new item is picked out of the item storages and whenever you print out your inventory

    • specialEffect

      void specialEffect​(Player player)
      This method runs at the start of every single turn to check if the conditions for the unique special effects are met. If they are, they update the player class through the argument.
      Parameters:
      player - - player argument that the special effects of items use to enhance.

    • getName

      java.lang.String getName()
      Method that all the items use to print out their name. This method is used everytime a new item is picked out of the item storages and whenever you print out your inventory

    • updatePlayerStats

      void updatePlayerStats​(Player player)
      This method runs every single time you pick up a new item. This updates the the player's stats with the item's stats
      Parameters:
      player - - player argument that is used to add the item's stats to the player's stats

    • getDescription

      java.lang.String getDescription()
      Method that all the items use to print out their description. This method is used everytime a new item is picked out of the item storages and whenever you print out your inventory
